allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement smart backfill with progressive historical data fetching

- Smart backfill: For each sensor, finds oldest data and fetches N days before it
- Progressive: Avoids reprocessing existing data, fills backward in time
- Improved error handling: Better retry logic in fetch-with-retry
- Schema updates: Handle nullable values in Telraam API responses
- Add database migrations for zero-result and backfill progress tracking
- Add deployment documentation and local testing scripts

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
